channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Best Project Zomboid Server Hosting of 2026
item.description: The best Project Zomboid server hosting doesn't have to be expensive or lack features. I've picked out all the best options for your zombie killing ways.

item.title: French police search X office in Paris, summons Elon Musk for questioning
item.description: The Paris prosecutor’s office announced that it is expanding a criminal investigation into X for alleged crimes, including the possession and distribution of child sexual exploitation material.

item.title: Tesla lance ses nouveaux panneaux solaires qui peuvent produire de l’électricité même à l’ombre (ou presque)
item.description: Le géant américain Tesla présente une nouvelle série de panneaux solaires destinés aux particuliers. Ces modèles sont optimisés pour une installation plus simple et une production solaire plus efficace.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : voici les ultimes offres à saisir pour ce dernier jour de promotions
item.description: Il ne faut pas se le cacher, la dernière démarque des soldes est souvent le moment où l'on trouve les meilleures offres, car les e-commerçants comme Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Boulanger veulent écouler les derniers stocks. Et c'est encore plus le cas pendant le dernier jour de l'événement...

item.title: Les emplois occupés par les femmes plus exposés à l’intelligence artificielle
item.description: Les emplois souvent occupés par des femmes et par des travailleurs qui ont une formation universitaire sont plus exposés à l’intelligence artificielle que d’autres, indique mardi l’Institut de la statistique du Québec.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs SSD M.2 internes (ou externe) pour votre PlayStation 5 en 2026 ?
item.description: Plus de place pour les jeux sur votre PlayStation 5 ou PS5 Pro toute neuve ? Ajoutez-lui donc un SSD interne NVMe ou un disque SSD externe pour ne plus jamais avoir à supprimer de titres. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles.

item.title: ExpressVPN slashes prices for Valentine’s Day – here’s how to save up to 81%
item.description: ExpressVPN Valentine's deal brings discounts on all one-year and two-year plans until February 16. Here's how to get your VPN bargain.

item.title: J’ai visité l’usine de batteries Porsche : pourquoi ce véritable joyau technologique en Europe m’a laissé un sentiment d’amertume
item.description: J'ai visité la première usine européenne de Porsche qui produit les batteries du nouveau Cayenne électrique. Une plongée dans un univers ultra robotisé et impressionnant, clairsemé de déceptions qui prouvent le retard pris par l'Europe sur l'Asie dans le domaine.

item.title: How to keep your Minecraft server safe and secure
item.description: Running your own Minecraft server is very satisfying but does incur some risk. Here's how to minimize that risk and run a successful server.

item.title: Les derniers stocks tablettes tactiles sont en train de s’écouler avant la fin des soldes d’hiver ! Le top des dernières offres
item.description: Pour la dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver, les tablettes tactiles se mettent le mieux possible en avant avec des réductions sans commune mesure. Boudés il n'y a pas si longtemps encore, ces appareils ont maintenant les faveurs des consommateurs, notamment pendant les soldes d'hiver.

item.title: Fears grow as Freeview could get switched off in 2034 — but there’s a major silver lining that could come from it
item.description: “It’s 2026 not 1950” – instead of keeping Freeview on life support for the sake of it we should focus on building something better.

item.description: U.S. Senator Chris Murphy called the reported deal “mind-blowing corruption.”

item.title: Grâce à cette réduction de 42 %, les lunettes AR premium Xreal One Pro transforment votre quotidien en grand écran permanent
item.description: Les Xreal One Pro sont la version luxe des Xreal One, des lunettes de réalité augmentée qui fonctionnent comme un écran externe d'ordinateur, à retrouver pour 485,58 euros sur AliExpress au lieu de 850 euros.

item.title: Nothing May Drop a Cheaper Phone and Headphones Soon
item.description: Are you ready to argue over a new Nothing phone design?

item.title: AMD FSR Redstone : pourquoi la nouvelle itération du FSR va changer la vie des joueurs équipés en AMD [Sponso]
item.description: Déployé en fin d’année dernière, le FSR Redstone, la technologie software made in AMD pour améliorer la qualité visuelle des jeux vidéo, est une petite révolution. Pourquoi ? Parce que le constructeur a revu sa conception du FSR de A à Z en travaillant sur une suite de fonctionnalités reposant sur l’IA pour booster les performances de ses GPU.

item.title: Microsoft is killing off some popular standalone OneDrive and SharePoint plans because they aren't profitable enough
item.description: Microsoft says low customer demand and "unintended or nonstandard usage" caused it to pull the plug on these OneDrive/SharePoint plans.

item.title: Disney announces Josh D’Amaro will be its new CEO after Iger departs
item.description: Stop me if you've heard this one before. Disney has announced a successor to outgoing CEO Bob Iger, effective in March. Josh D’Amaro, current chairman of Disney Experiences, was tapped for the role in a unanimous vote by the company's board of directors. D’Amaro has been at Disney for 28 years, where he oversaw theme parks, cruises and consumer products including video games. The company had previously appointed Bob Chapek, the Disney Parks chairman at the time, as successor to Bob Iger in 2020. At the time, Iger had served as CEO since 2005. But Chapek only lasted until 2022, when Bob Iger re...

item.title: Stephen Colbert’s ‘Starfleet Academy’ Role Is Driving Me Nuts
item.description: The late-night host's role as the academy announcer feels like the show at its least sincere.

item.title: Paris Authorities Raid the Offices of Elon Musk’s X
item.description: Elon Musk and former X CEO Linda Yaccarino have also been summoned for questioning.

item.title: What tech CEOs and executives have said about ICE’s actions in Minnesota
item.description: The Trump administration’s approach to immigration has reached a level of violence that the tech industry cannot ignore. Here's how tech leaders are responding to the moment.

item.title: February’s Xbox Game Pass additions include High on Life 2, Madden NFL 26 and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
item.description: Microsoft has revealed the first wave of Xbox Game Pass additions for February, and it feels like there's a bit of something for everyone this time around. Two of the titles land on the service today across the Game Pass Ultimate, Premium and PC Game Pass tiers: Final Fantasy II (cloud, Xbox Series X/S and PC) and Like A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii (cloud, console, handheld and PC). Final Fantasy II is a "remodeled 2D take" on the classic 1988 RPG, while Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii is a wild-looking spin-off of the main Like a Dragon series with pirates and naval combat.Madden NFL 26 is hittin...

item.title: Claude Code was down, forcing developers to take a long coffee break
item.description: Anthropic's Claude AI models experienced a major outage today, impacting products like Claude Code. Developers were seeing a 500 error when trying to use Claude Code, and Anthropic said that it was seeing elevated error rates on its APIs "across all Claude models." Anthropic quickly identified the root cause and implemented a fix within around […]

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2026: Everything we're expecting from the S26 launch
item.description: Samsung’s 2025 was filled with new foldables, an ultra-thin new form factor and the launch of Google's XR platform. After making some announcements at CES 2026, the company is expected to host its first Galaxy Unpacked of the year in February to introduce the Galaxy S26 lineup. Official invites have yet to be shared, but the date is widely expected to be near the end of the month.Whenever it does happen, Engadget will be covering Galaxy Unpacked live, and we'll most likely have hands-on coverage of Samsung's new smartphones soon after they're announced. While we wait for an official invite, he...

item.title: Our chances of seeing a new Nvidia-powered handheld PC with RTX 5070-level power are improving – but I'd expect the price to be a dealbreaker
item.description: I smell a new Nvidia handheld PC on the horizon, thanks to fresh chip teases from Jensen Huang, but let's hope I haven't jinxed it.

item.title: The Dyson PencilVac is finally available and costs $600
item.description: The Dyson PencilVac stick vacuum is finally available for purchase in the US after being revealed in the first half of last year. It costs $600. The company says this is the "world's slimmest vacuum cleaner." We haven't broken out any rulers to confirm that statement, but it's certainly a ridiculously thin stick vac. It achieves this thinness by using a motor inspired by the company's Supersonic hair dryer. This is a small motor that can actually rest in the shaft, so there's not a noticeable bulge where the components have been placed. This stick vacuum is actually, well, a stick. Just take a...

item.title: These speakers are what you’d find in the center of an art, molecular science and hi-fi Venn diagram and I want them
item.description: Love music, love interior design, want something that combines both on your wall? Meet Ultrasonic's Molecular Audio system

item.title: I didn't even know Netflix was on the PS3, but it won't matter soon — the streaming app will leave the console after 16 years next month
item.description: Netflix is being removed from the PlayStation 3 on March 2, 2026, after 16 years of support.

item.title: I didn’t expect to love Dyson’s PencilVac Fluffycones – but I did
item.description: As The Verge's resident robot vacuum reviewer, I don't have a lot of time (or space) in my life for stick vacs, and frankly, the ones I have used have largely disappointed me. Top-heavy, bulky, always getting clogged or running out of battery - they're so… manual. But then I met PencilVac Fluffycones, Dyson's new […]

item.title: MSI Prestige 14 Flip AI+ review: An ultraportable for Arc Raiders, thanks to Intel's Panther Lake
item.description:
MSI Prestige 14 Flip AI+ is a surprisingly powerful ultraportable held back by a clunky trackpad. It's a shame, really, because it's very well-designed and thanks to Intel’s Panther Lake CPU, it can even run games like Arc Raiders without breaking a sweat. It also has more ports than most thin and light machines, its OLED screen is great for productivity work and at three pounds it's easy to carry around all day. But curse its mechanical trackpad — why does it even exist when Apple, Microsoft and others have been able to implement excellent haptic touchpads for years? Come on now.
Hardware W...

item.title: Moltbook, the viral social network for AI agents, has a major security problem
item.description: Security researchers say misconfigured databases and public API keys left the AI agent social network open to anyone on the internet. The rise of OpenClaw, a proactive agentic AI controlled through interfaces more familiar to the average user than tools like Anthropic’s Claude Code, which enthralled early adopters over the holiday period, has been one of the most seismic shifts in the AI world since the release of ChatGPT. By piggybacking on user-friendly interfaces paired with powerful AI agent technology, OpenClaw has pushed AI further into the public eye....

item.title: TikTok recovers from dip in usage that benefited rival apps following US ownership change
item.description: TikTok usage dropped following ownership change, benefiting rival apps. But now, its numbers are climbing again.

item.title: Ce jeu français qui a marqué l’Histoire du jeu vidéo est gratuit sur GOG
item.description: Il n'est pas aussi connu que Super Mario ou Final Fantasy, et pourtant il a bel et bien marqué l'histoire. Le jeu français Alone in the Dark est proposé gratuitement sur GOG.

item.title: The first BTS concert in over three years will stream live on Netflix in March
item.description: Netflix is back with another livestream production guaranteed to excite K-POP fans worldwide. The streamer has announced that BTS will be performing live on Netflix. It marks the band's first performance after almost four years — the members took a hiatus to complete South Korea's mandatory military service. The live concert will air on Saturday, March 21, one day after BTS releases their new album Arirang and will be aptly titled BTS The Comeback Live | Arirang. The show will physically take place in Seoul's Gwanghwamun Square and stream live at 8PM KST/7 AM ET/4 AM ET. Yes, viewers in the U...

item.title: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health
item.description: Luffu uses AI in the background to gather and organize family information, learn day-to-day patterns, and flag notable changes so families can stay aligned and address potential wellbeing issues.

item.title: Soldes PC portables : voici l’ultime sélection des meilleures promotions sur les laptops bureautiques et gaming

Nombre de PC portables sont en promotion lors de la dernière démarque des soldes d'hiver mais seuls quelques-uns méritent vraiment de figurer dans cette sélection.

item.description: If your phone feels too small but most tablets feel too big, Apple’s latest iPad Mini functions as a nice in-between. Thankfully, if you’ve been waiting for a discount, the base model with Wi-Fi and 128GB of storage is on sale at Amazon and Best Buy for $399 ($100 off), which is $50 shy of […]

item.title: Alerte Play Store : le malware Anatsa a piraté 50 000 smartphones Android, désinstallez vite cette app
item.description: Un faux « lecteur de documents » a été débusqué sur le Play Store. Cette application cache le cheval de Troie bancaire Anatsa, taillé pour siphonner l'argent de votre compte.

item.description: Entre son design transparent et son système de glyph, le Nothing Phone (3a) saura vous surprendre. Pour vous attirer encore plus, AliExpress retire presque 40 % de son prix de base et le fait tomber à seulement 214,46 euros avec un code promo.

item.description: La plateforme de streaming d'animation Crunchyroll démarre l'année 2026 avec un changement dont les utilisateurs se seraient bien passés.

item.title: L’empire de Musk vaut maintenant 1 250 milliards… mais repose sur une faille majeure
item.description: Dans une nouvelle opération commerciale, Elon Musk a réuni X et xAI dans un seul groupe, le tout, désormais sous la coupe de SpaceX. Ce qui en fait aujourd'hui l'entreprise non cotée en Bourse la plus chère du monde. Mais pourquoi tout ce fracas ?

item.title: Disney’s new CEO will have to do something harder than run the company. He’ll have to be the face of it
item.description: Since Walt Disney first created the company a century ago, Disney CEOs have been highly visible in Hollywood, on Wall Street, and across pop culture. For the past six years, Josh D’Amaro has overseen experiences, such as theme parks and cruises, at the Walt Disney Company. Starting March 18, he’ll add the rest of the company to his responsibilities....

item.title: Pourquoi la Chine dit non aux poignées de portes électriques des voitures
item.description: Pourtant très populaires sur les voitures électriques, la Chine vient d’acter l’interdiction des poignées de porte uniquement électriques. Une démarche visant à accroître la sécurité à bord des véhicules, mais qui ne devrait pas plaire à tout le monde !

item.title: YouTube siffle la fin de la récré pour ceux qui ne veulent pas payer la lecture en arrière-plan
item.description: YouTube serait peut-être en train de désactiver la lecture en arrière-plan sur plusieurs navigateurs mobiles tiers, une fonction prisée pour ne pas avoir à payer d'abonnement Premium.

item.description: Ubisoft procède à une maintenance à la fois inattendue et d'envergure. L'éditeur français a coupé ses serveurs pendant plusieurs heures.

item.description: Découvrez notre comparatif des meilleures autonomies pour une voiture électrique. Des citadines, aux berlines en passant par les SUV, voici une sélection des voitures électriques à la meilleure autonomie sur la route.

item.title: Notepad++ says it was hijacked by Chinese state-sponsored hackers
item.description: Last year, the creator of Notepad++ rolled out an update for the text and source code editor after security experts reported that bad actors were hijacking its update mechanism to redirect traffic to malicious servers. It led to users downloading compromised executables that could infect their devices. Now, Don Ho has revealed that multiple security experts investigated the breach and determined that the threat actor “is likely a Chinese state-sponsored group.” He said it explained why experts observed highly selective targeting during the campaign and why only traffic from certain users were ...

item.title: Elon Musk’s X offices in Paris were just raided by French prosecutors. Here’s why
item.description: Prosecutors are also seeking Elon Musk for questioning. French prosecutors raided the offices of social media platform X on Tuesday as part of a preliminary investigation into allegations including spreading child sexual abuse images and deepfakes. They have also summoned billionaire owner Elon Musk for questioning.X and Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI also face intensifying scrutiny from Britain’s data privacy regulator, which opened formal investigations into how they handled personal data when they developed and deployed Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok.Grok, which was...

item.title: Millions of books died so Claude could live
item.description: When ChatGPT launched, in November of 2022, it started a race that almost immediately consumed the tech industry. OpenAI didn't invent the concept of AI, but most of the state-of-the-art technology was confined to research labs at companies and institutions around the world. Then, suddenly, it was everywhere. And better than anyone expected. So many […]...

item.title: AI as the key to overcoming retail’s next challenge: achieving operational excellence
item.description: How achieving operational brilliance can be achieved with AI to bridge the gap between the issue many retailers face - limited resources and staffing.

item.title: Spain set to ban social media for children under 16
item.description: Spain will join the growing list of countries banning access to social media for children, Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez announced Tuesday. The law will apply to users under 16 years of age amidst a broader push to hold social media companies accountable for hate speech, social division and illegal content. Speaking at the World Governments Summit in Dubai, Prime Minister Sanchez excoriated social media, calling it a "failed state" where "laws are ignored and crime is endured." He spoke to the importance of digital governance for these platforms, highlighting recent incidents like X's AI chatbo...

item.title: Trump Admin Sued For Defunding the “Most Important Infrastructure Project in the Country”
item.description: The project would improve the most heavily traveled portion of the national passenger rail system.

item.title: La Switch est la console la plus vendue de l’histoire de Nintendo, devant la DS
item.description: Malgré le lancement de la Switch 2 en juin dernier, Nintendo continue de tirer tout le jus restant des bonnes vieilles Switch de première génération (il en reste !). Des modèles qui continuent de se vendre… et qui représentent désormais la gamme la plus vendue du constructeur, devant la vénérable DS.

item.title: Amazon's Echo Show 8 and 11 are down to new all-time lows
item.description: Amazon is running a sale on two of its newest devices. First, there's the Echo Show 8, which is down to $150 from $180 — a 17 percent discount. Next up is the Echo Show 11, which is more or less the same device, just bigger. This model has dropped 18 percent to $180 from $220. Both deals bring the Echo Shows down to new all-time low prices. The Echo Show 8 and 11 came out in mid-November with the main difference being screen size. The Echo Show 8 has an 8.7-inch HD screen that Amazon claims is 15 percent larger than its predecessor. Meanwhile, the Echo Show 11 is, you guessed it, an 11-inch F...
